name: Seeking for Poufix
description:
A game made by 3 developers during Ludum Dare 48 :

ItsMeFJ, Benosuke and me, Azel Waker

Gameplay

It's a Point & Click where you have to solve little puzzles in order to find your cat.

Story

The protagonist's cat named "Poufix" has snuck into a bunker and the player must go through the different levels to find him.
